mapper.sql: MedItemNo, MedOrderNo, DrugNo, Number, ExecDay, WayNo, ExecWhen, ExecAim, DayDose, Dose, DoseUnit, UsageNo
mapper.insert:
insert into meditem
MedItemNo,
MedOrderNo,
DrugNo,
Number,
ExecDay,
WayNo,
ExecWhen,
ExecAim,
DayDose,
Dose,
DoseUnit,
UsageNo,
#{medItemNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{drugNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{number,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{execDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{execWhen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{execAim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dayDose,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dose,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{doseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{usageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update meditem
MedOrderNo = #{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DrugNo = #{drugNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Number = #{number,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ExecDay = #{execDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WayNo = #{wayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ExecWhen = #{execWhen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ExecAim = #{execAim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DayDose = #{dayDose,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Dose = #{dose,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DoseUnit = #{doseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UsageNo = #{usageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MedItemNo = #{medItemNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update meditem set MedOrderNo = #{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DrugNo = #{drugNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Number = #{number,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ExecDay = #{execDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WayNo = #{wayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExecWhen = #{execWhen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExecAim = #{execAim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DayDose = #{dayDose,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Dose = #{dose,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DoseUnit = #{doseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsageNo = #{usageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MedItemNo = #{medItemNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select mei.medItemNo,mei.medOrderNo,mei.drugNo,mei.number,mei.execDay,mei.wayNo,mei.execWhen,mei.execAim,mei.dayDose, mei.dose,mei.doseUnit,mei.usageNo, ds.drugSetNo,ds.hisDrugCode,ds.commonName,ds.itemName, ds.nhiType,ds.manufactory,ds.category,ds.essentialDrug, ds.ctrlDrug,ds.highAlert,ds.dividend,ds.saleUnit,ds.divisor, ds.doseUnit as doseUnit1,ds.form,ds.material,ds.dosege,ds.dosegeUnit,ds.saleGenPrice, ds.volume,ds.unit from meditem mei,drugset ds where mei.drugNo = ds.drugSetNo and mei.medOrderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select mei.* from mallorder mao,medorder meo,meditem mei where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mei.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mao.MallNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
